channel.title: Grid 4 on Documentation for Selenium
channel.description: Recent content in Grid 4 on Documentation for Selenium

item.title: Components
item.description: Router The Router takes care of forwarding the request to the correct component. It is the entry point of the Grid, all external requests will be received by it. The Router behaves differently depending on the request. If it is a new session request, the Router will forward it to the Distributor (where the new session creation will be handled). If the request belongs to an existing session, the Router will send the session id to the Session Map, and the Session Map will return the Node where the session is running.
